body: I want to have 2 monitors for my computer I have a 24" LED LG monitor that came with my computer and I don't think I can get another one the same so does anyone know where I can get a 24" LED Monitor HD and in NZ will be good and cheaper is better but not super cheap and will break in 2 mins
body_tagged: I want to have 2 monitors for my computer I have a 24" LED LG monitor that came with my computer and I don't think I can get another one the same so does anyone know where I can get a 24" LED Monitor HD and in NZ will be good and cheaper is better but not super cheap and will break in 2 mins
title: 24" LED Monitor

replies.body: and how do I set up 2 monitors
replies.body_tagged: and how do I set up 2 monitors

replies.body:
LED monitors won't be good for your eyes long term, your better of getting a bit more expensive on with glass over it for example acer. 

To have 2 screens all you need is 2 cables that you can context to your graphics card on the back of your pc, I have 2 HDMI cables. When to have that so e just go into configurations on your OS and in monitors press whichever one you want to be tbe main one.
replies.body_tagged:
